items.title: ESG with real value
items.text: Verifiable data usable in CSRD/ESRS reports: photos, geolocation and certifiable KPIs.

items.text: Visibility as a sponsor of high-impact local challenges, with storytelling ready for corporate channels.

steps.text: Verified data, photos, geolocation and KPIs for sustainability reports and corporate communication.
